00005 #include <bpm/bpm_messages.h>

00008 int get_IQ( double amp, double phase, double refamp, double refphase,
00009             double *Q, double *I ) {
00010 
00011   if( ! Q || ! I ) {
00012     bpm_error( "Invalid pointer arguments in get_IQ(...)",
00013                __FILE__, __LINE__ );
00014     return BPM_FAILURE;
00015   }
00016 
00017   *I = -DBL_MAX;
00018   *Q = -DBL_MAX;
00019 
00020   if( refamp > 0. ) {
00021     *I = amp / refamp * cos( phase - refphase );
00022     *Q = amp / refamp * sin( phase - refphase );
00023   } else {
00024     bpm_warning( "Reference amplitude is 0 in get_IQ(...)",
00025                  __FILE__, __LINE__ );
00026     return BPM_FAILURE;
00027   }
00028 
00029   return BPM_SUCCESS;
00030 }
